Name: 星之传说
About the game: Explore a strategy-type RPG, collect equipment, abilities, and upgrades in an open world. After capturing the five magic palaces. The causes of jihad and the rise and fall of civilizations in the Primordial Age can be identified. There are dozens of spells in the game, corresponding to six attributes. Monsters have corresponding attribute weaknesses. After guessing the attribute weakness and using the corresponding magic, the damage can be increased by 2-3 times. Of course, monsters also have different attribute magic, which requires players to guess and choose the corresponding attribute resistance potion. There are three types of weapons: swords, bows, and guns. The single attack of the sword is the highest. Bow and arrow attack times 1-3 times. The total damage of the three attacks is slightly higher than that of the sword. Guns are all magic attacks. and assign random attributes. Dozens of props, including blood and blue, attribute enhancement, etc. With skills, different play styles can be derived. feature: 1 An open big map, hidden treasures are scattered all over the world, and the location can be obtained according to the dialogue of wandering NPCs 2 Use the latest self-developed rendering technology, light and shadow technology, rendering technology, time-lapse effect, flower and grass particle effect to build a lifelike and dreamy world. 3 Each enemy is originally designed with smooth animation to match its own characteristics. 4 Professional companies have made dozens of tracks to better enhance the atmosphere of the game 5 Originally designed magic particle effects to create a better fighting atmosphere. 6 rich weapons, reasonable collocation, improve the game fun. 7 dozens of props are available for character selection, and reasonable matching can produce peculiar effects 8 Guess the different weaknesses of the character, test the player's intuition and strategy. 9 According to the different attributes of the enemy's attack and skills, different resistance weapons and props are adopted to test the player's intuition, strategy and observation.
